name: Civic Helicopters, Inc.
about: Civic Helicopters, Inc., located at Palomar Airport in Carlsbad, California, has been a premier helicopter training school for over 30 years. We offer a comprehensive range of training programs, including Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, and Flight Instructor certifications. Our highly experienced instructors provide one-on-one training, ensuring each student receives personalized attention and guidance. We conduct both flight and ground school concurrently, utilizing FAA-approved syllabi and state-of-the-art simulators. Our mission is to equip students with the knowledge and skills to safely operate helicopters in various environments, from urban areas to mountains and deserts. With a strong focus on safety, convenience, and individualized instruction, Civic Helicopters is dedicated to helping students achieve their aviation goals in a comfortable and supportive environment.
